sentences: Mälu võib olla nii hea kui halb.
Ta ootas kaua ja tema mälu taas avanes.
context: The Estonian word 'mälu' primarily means memory - both the human cognitive ability to remember things and the computer concept of storage/memory. It can refer to recollections stored in the mind, RAM in computing contexts, or the general capacity for storing information. The word has multiple grammatical forms including nominative (mälu), genitive (mälude), partitive (mälusid), and various other cases depending on how it's used in a sentence.
